publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-492 Gil Paterson: Action Against Human Trafficking—That the Parliament notes the Amnesty International campaign against all forms of human trafficking in the United Kingdom; recognises that victims of trafficking often exhibit the symptoms of post-traumatic stress syndrome, depression and anxiety, as well as evidence of physical harm; recognises that we now have a duty of care to all victims of trafficking regardless of nationality, and calls on the Scottish Government to show leadership in the implementation of the Council of Europe Convention on Action Against Trafficking in Human Beings by implementing the provisions of the convention for which it has devolved responsibility to the highest standard and co-ordinating the great work that is already being undertaken by local authorities, police forces, non-governmental organisations and voluntary organisations to promote best practice, standardise levels of care and ensure consistency across Scotland. Supported by: Joe FitzPatrick*, Christine Grahame*

S3M-492 Gil Paterson: Action Against Human Trafficking—That the Parliament notes the Amnesty International campaign against all forms of human trafficking in the United Kingdom; recognises that victims of trafficking often exhibit the symptoms of post-traumatic stress syndrome, depression and anxiety, as well as evidence of physical harm; recognises that we now have a duty of care to all victims of trafficking regardless of nationality, and calls on the Scottish Government to show leadership in the implementation of the Council of Europe Convention on Action Against Trafficking in Human Beings by implementing the provisions of the convention for which it has devolved responsibility to the highest standard and co-ordinating the great work that is already being undertaken by local authorities, police forces, non-governmental organisations and voluntary organisations to promote best practice, standardise levels of care and ensure consistency across Scotland. Supported by: Joe FitzPatrick, Christine Grahame

S3M-492 Action Against Human Trafficking (lodged on 18 September 2007) Shirley-Anne Somerville*, Stuart McMillan*, Kenneth Gibson*, Angela Constance*, Bill Wilson*, Hugh O’Donnell*, Bashir Ahmad*, Christina McKelvie*, Elaine Smith*, Patrick Harvie*, Ken Macintosh*, Bob Doris*
S3M-492 Action Against Human Trafficking (lodged on 18 September 2007) Keith Brown*, Brian Adam*, Trish Godman*, Bill Kidd*, Karen Gillon*, Jamie Hepburn*, Dave Thompson*, Liam McArthur*
S3M-492 Action Against Human Trafficking (lodged on 18 September 2007) Cathy Peattie*, Roseanna Cunningham*, Robin Harper*, Marlyn Glen*
S3M-492 Action Against Human Trafficking (lodged on 18 September 2007) Sandra White*
S3M-492 Action Against Human Trafficking (lodged on 18 September 2007) Pauline McNeill*, Margaret Smith*
S3M-492 Action Against Human Trafficking (lodged on 18 September 2007) Jack McConnell*
